languages.text: The servitor is heavily damaged. Its {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are greatly reduced.
